60 - 11 = <<60-11=9>>9

Input: Which is the most common name of an elephant in Latin America?  Input: Latin America Name of Elephants:  Muntjac E: Cebuina G: Mangueva H: Zumbuco I: Santa Feria J: Sibul
Output: Latin America Name of An Elephant:  Muntjac Muntjac  The Cebuina elephant (Cebuina virginica), called Santa Feria in Mexico, is commonly called, Muntjac.  Muntjac is also the name of many other subspecies.  Santa Feria is an endangered and unique elephant species, occurring in only 12 countries: Brazil, Ecuador, India, Mexico, Panama, Peru, Thailand, and Vietnam.  Some species of this species occur as little as 1,000 to 8,000 years old.  The Muntjac elephant's size and shape vary between 1.6 meters (5 feet) and 2.4 meters (8 feet) in length, and weighs between 900 kilograms (1,715 pounds) and 2,500 kilograms (5,000 pounds).  The Muntjac is known to be slow in climbing, but swift on the water, reaching speeds of 18 to 21 mph (30 to 40 kph).  The Muntjak's trunk is approximately 1.7 - 2.6 feet (520 - 1,240 cm) long.  The Muntjacs are also known as "slender elephants," "water elephants," "wetland elephants," "sea horses," and "moose grass elephants."  Muntjac and related species can be confused with elephants seen in the Philippines, but do not appear to be the same animals.

(A) The direction along which you might want to stand.  (B) The best place to stand for pedestrians who may cross in front of you.   (C) Best place to stand for cars who may stop right in front of you.
Solution: Choose (A). People who stand at the intersection are more likely to stop for pedestrians than cars. At a light, cars may stop right in front and right behind you. At a crosswalk, you may stand out in front of other cars, but you may not be in a crosswalk at all times. At the corner, you may be in a corner where no right-turn lanes are available, in a busy crosswalk where people may suddenly stop or step aside and in an intersection where all lanes are available, where there will be many pedestrians with arms in the air. If you stand in the middle, it is possible that most people will be able to see you and most people will be able or willing to stop for you. If you stand in one of the lanes, it will be difficult to see pedestrians and/or drivers. If you stand at a crosswalk, both you and the pedestrians in front of you may be waiting for the light to turn green, or may be standing at the intersection waiting for it to clear. If you stand at the intersection alone, people may wait for a minute, or a few seconds, for you to turn around. If you stand at an intersection with sidewalks, people may move out of your way if you come to a stop.
Solution: Choose one of the other 4. A car line is safer than a bicycle line. The sidewalk is safer than the crosswalk. The intersection has crosswalks.

You would not always hear the motorist's voice through the meter reader.  For example a driver may pull off to park, and you hear the motorist honk their horn while trying to reach the meter.  You can still determine if a motorist is paying attention by checking the meter for the vehicle they are parked next to.
If you miss the motorist honking their horn for the reason that they are not paying attention, you will be notified of the violation, and $100 will be deducted from whatever other amount you should have paid.

On Friday, the owner didn't go into the bathroom.  After a few seconds, the owner went in the bathroom, and the kitten ran out.  When the owner returned from her trip, the kitten ran to the door to the bathroom and jumped up on her as she stepped off the bathroom bench. Then the cat ran out.

So on each of the three days Sally took no steps.  If Sally were a robot, she'd say that she could make no steps because it was a new object. If you are not familiar with Google Docs it's actually really easy to start. If you already know how to start a Google Doc (such as what to put in the first blank), then you just need to have Google Docs open and then just drag and drop. Once that's open you just follow these instructions to create your own word list that you can edit and add to!

If you want to create a Google Docs document and add/change the words already in it or add words that you would like your friends to use to create a Google Doc, then all you need to do is right-click on it, select "add to word list", and go to the next part of the steps until you hit "save changes".

If you want your friends to use your Google Docs document in class, just go to their desktop and right-click on it and select "add to word lists" on it.

And finally, if you want to create a new Google Docs document and have them use it too, that's exactly what you can do! Just select "create new document" on it, go to the first blank, enter whatever your friends want to put in it and then you can save it by hitting "save changes". Your friends, including you, can then easily use the document when it's convenient for you and edit it whenever they want!

everything French, French music, French literature, French history, French architecture,

Larkin received the letter: "It's

to teach at our universities".

Larkin had to say: "It's impossible to deny me teaching privileges at
the Universities of Paris and Washington.

won't grant me this privilege, please
tell the U.S. Embassy in London
that in France we do not let
foreign nationals teach at our
universities."

A melody will typically be used in a piece of music for two reasons. The first reason is that the notes are too close together or are on a loop. It is most likely the A, B and C that will be heard, not the higher notes like D or E. The second reason is to establish emotional resonance between the piano and the violin. The same thing is true for a melody in which the voice becomes the instrument. A melody with just as many notes as strings is much more likely to appear in a violin concerto than it is in an instrumental work. The last reason is that a melody is important to be used in film or television. A melody helps give the story a certain feel and atmosphere. An intelligent, well-functioning person is empathic. They understand people better than their social surroundings can, and the better they understand people, the better they can understand themselves and thus will become more well-functioning themselves (e.g., see above). To be empathetic is to be able to understand people’s emotional needs and desires and thus become empathic oneself, thus allowing one person to learn skills they might have never been able to.
How does a person become empathic? They need to see people’s emotional traits and learn to feel empathy.
How does a well-functioning person become empathic? First, a person should become aware of their own emotions during their daily lives, as well as the emotions of others. Because emotions are difficult for people to understand, they must begin understanding them by listening to others. After understanding others’ emotions, a person then wishes for other people to have empathy towards themselves. Next, people need to accept their own emotions, as well as those of others, and then allow themselves to be empathetic towards others. Finally, a person must find ways of letting go of their feelings and allowing others to let go of their feelings even if those feelings are unachievable. In this way, the emotional aspects of one’s life and self become strengthened.

Input:Three people were hired to clean out a man's bedroom. Each person was to take one day to clean it. In addition, each person was to take another day and clean it again. For each day, the people were to be paid $100 for their time. If the man chose one of the people to do both the bedroom and the bathroom, the man would receive $200 each day. If the man chose two people each, the man would receive the above sum each day.
After each day of cleaning, the man paid for half of it. Each time he put clothes away, he paid for the amount of those clothes that had been left. The man then paid for the amount of the towels that had been used for the day. He also paid for any extra cleaning that had to be done when he went to shower each day. If, after he got all this paid for, the bedroom and the bathroom looked presentable and clean, the man would get $100 each day. If the two bedrooms and the bathroom looked presentably clean for four days, the man would get another $200 each day. However, if the bedrooms did not look presentable for more than that, then the man would have to pay again. Every time the man got new clothes to put away and put the old clothes away properly, he paid for those clothes as well.
However, if the bedrooms and the bathroom looked clean for a total of 10 days on each of the previous four cleanings, the man would receive another $200 each day
The total amount of $200 times 10 days x 10 days x 10 days = $360 and the man would get to keep all the money that had gone into his bank account on each cleanings.
The average time it took the man to get to each bathroom was about an hour. For the other bathrooms, however, the time could be considerably less, especially if at some stage on the next cleaning, the other bathrooms were tidied up.
So in total the man had to invest $180 worth of money to get $280 each day.
The total investment cost him less than 1% of his total income (if the rooms and the bathrooms had not seen much use from him during that time, he would have spent less).
So the final answer (from a purely financial standpoint) is 270.5
